events.message: We have received the application from the candidate applying for the software engineer position on our team. The resume and cover letter demonstrate relevant skills and experience.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer, development, and DevOps experience mentioned in the resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidate's file and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their background, interest in the software engineering role, and availability for interviews.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview for the software engineer candidate has been scheduled with the engineering team for next week.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities relevant to our software development needs.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and other employment details with the candidate.
The HR interview went well. The candidate expressed alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the position.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate, including salary, benefits, and start date details.
The candidate has provided feedback expressing their positive regard for the offer and excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the offer to join the company as a software engineer.
Onboarding processes have started for the new software engineer, including account setups, access provisioning, and introductions to the team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering department.
